1.1.name: wordpress/flash-video-gallery
1.1.description:
With this plugin you can create video galleries. To display the plugin in your Posts type [flash video gallery ID], where ID is the gallery ID.

For create and configure the galleries press in your Wordpress admin: Settings->Video Gallery.

If the plugin does not work, try downloading from http://www.webpsilon.com/wordpress-plugins/flash-video-gallery/
